sys_security_acl.description: Allow read for all fields in x_560219_se_submission, for users with roles (x_560219_se.se_admin, x_560219_se.se_user), and if the ACL script returns true, and if the ACL condition (sys_created_by=javascript:gs.getUserName()^EQ) evaluates to true.
